name: romyrobot
0:
”Alexa, tell Romy Robot to start cleaning.”
”Alexa, Ask Romy Robot what it's doing right now”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: romy robot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Romy robot skill for Amazon Alexa. Set up your robot with Alexa in just a few minutes through the ROMY app. ROMY‘s patented Lidar Front Laser technology guarantees simplified cleaning routines. By defining rooms and areas, you can tell ROMY to clean the kitchen, under the table or anywhere else that requires a quick vacuum.

START
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to start cleaning.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to start.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to clean.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to clean all
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to clean up.

PAUSE/RESUME
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to pause.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to pause cleaning.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to resume.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to resume cleaning.


STOP
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to stop.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to stop cleaning.

SEND TO DOCKING STATION
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to go back home.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to return home.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to go home.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to go to the docking station.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to go back to the charging station.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to charge itself.
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot to charge.


STATUS 
 • Alexa, ask Romy Robot what it’s doing.
 • Alexa, ask Romy Robot if it’s done.
 • Alexa, ask Romy Robot what it’s doing right now.

CLEAN SELECTED ROOMS OR AREAS

 • Alexa, ask Romy Robot to clean my Kitchen
 • Alexa, tell Romy Robot there is a mess in the Bedroom
*Full list of rooms is available in the app. Make sure you use the same room name on your map.
